info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 10 at 4:40PM PDT until October 10 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark.
* WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 440 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Green Valley, Sam Boyd Stadium, Paradise, Anthem, East Las Vegas, The Strip, Fremont Street, Enterprise, Southern Highlands, Lake Las Vegas, Silverado Ranch, Harry Reid International Airport, Seven Hills, Unlv, Henderson Executive Airport, Stratosphere Tower and Black Mtn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING
